text: numbala polove svalpa deneku vasayen dubalayin va sita janaya numbalava pæhæra gena yanu ætæyi numbala biyen siti avasthava numbala menehi kara balanu. evita numbala krtavedi viya hækivanu pinisa ohu numbala bharagena ohuge upakaraya tulin numbalava ohu saktimat kaleya. tavada yahapat dæyin numbalata posanaya kaleya
